subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A team has hit four consecutive home runs before, but never in a situation like this — bottom of the ninth inning, down by four runs, first place on the line, division rival in the field, and elite closer in the bullpen.
snippet: A team has hit four consecutive home runs before, but never in a situation like this — bottom of the ninth inning, down by four runs, first place on the line, division rival in the field, and elite closer in the bullpen.
